goal: Detect artifacts that are declared in multiple manifests without proper supersession
description: This is Task 128 in GitHub issue #86 (Architectural Coherence Validator). The check queries the system snapshot (aggregated artifacts from all manifests) to detect when a manifest declares an artifact that already exists elsewhere without using supersedes. Returns CoherenceIssue with IssueType.DUPLICATE for any duplicates found.

contains.name: check_duplicate_artifacts
contains.description: Main function that checks for duplicate artifact declarations. Returns list of CoherenceIssue with IssueType.DUPLICATE for any duplicates found.

contains.name: _find_existing_artifact
contains.description: Helper to search system artifacts for an existing artifact with matching name/type. Returns file path where artifact is already defined, or None.

contains.name: _is_valid_supersession
contains.description: Check if the manifest properly supersedes the file containing the existing artifact. Returns True if supersession is valid, False otherwise.
